preface.title: Preface
preface.para: Federate Embedded offers the power of the a federated relational query engine for use with any Java application - without the need for a separate server process. Accessing your federated data is as easy as making JDBC connection to any relational data source. This guide will take you through

listitem.para: Deployment of Federate Embedded in your environment
Connecting to your VDB and issuing federated queries against your VDB and getting results back

preface.para: Commercial development support, production support, and training for Federate is available through JBoss. Federate is a Professional Open Source project and a critical component of the JBoss Enterprise Data Services Platform.

sect1.title: What this about?
sect1.para: This guide takes you through an introduction to the concepts important to Federate Embedded, downloading the software, and building and deploying a demonstration virtual database in 60 minutes. There is a lot to cover, so let's begin!

note.para: Please read Federation Basics and understand different terminologies used, resources needed and artifacts that need to be generated before developing a successful application. In this example, we provide very minimal feature set that is supported by Federate for the sake of simplicity and time.
